item.title: Apache Hop 2.10 is available!!
item.description: After about four months of work on 139 tickets, the Apache Hop community is pleased to announce the general availability of Apache Hop 2.10.0. A huge thank you to everyone who made this possible. Â Let's take a closer look at what Hop 2.10 brings: Notable bug fixes New Features Block code execution in UDJC and UDJE Ability to configure multiple Azure accounts File Explorer perspective improvements Community GitHub Issues or download Hop 2.
